author: Jon Fingas
title: Quibi fast-tracks plans to bring its bite-sized shows to TVs
description: Did you wonder why Quibi insisted on launching a mobile-focused video service in the middle of a pandemic without a realistic way to watch on your TV? So did Quibi. CEO Meg Whitman told CNBC that the company was stepping up plans to let the app cast to TVs. B…
content: Did you wonder why Quibi insisted on launching a mobile-focused video service in the middle of a pandemic without a realistic way to watch on your TV? So did Quibi. CEO Meg Whitman toldCNBC that the company was stepping up plans to let the app cast to TVs. Bi… [+599 chars]
